rule.description: ATT&CK T1041: Suspicious ADSI-Cache Usage By Unknown Tool
rule.info: detects the usage of ADSI (LDAP) operations by tools. This may also detect tools like LDAPFragger.
Falsepositives: Other legimate tools, which do ADSI (LDAP) operations, e.g. any remoting activity by MMC, Powershell, Windows etc..
